Package edu.cnm.deepdive.powdr.adapter

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConversationAdapter.OnConvoClickListener
    Interface for the onClickListener when selecting an item in the RecyclerView.
    SkiResortAdapter.OnResortClickListener
    Interface for the onClickListener when selecting an item in the RecyclerView.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConversationAdapter
    Adapter class to convert message objects from the database to be displayed by the ConversationsFragment.
    MessageAdapter
    Adapter class to convert message objects from the database to be displayed by the ChatFragment.
    PostAdapter
    Adapter to attach the list of Post to the RecyclerView in the WallFragment.
    ProfileInfoAdapter
    Adapter to convert User information to the ProfileFragment.
    SkiResortAdapter
    Adapter to attach the list of ski resorts to the RecyclerView in the SkiResortFragment and open the proceeding WeatherFragment for the respective SkiResort chosen.
